resume.name: Sangmin Lee
introduction: I graduated from the Department of Information and Communication and worked as an Infrastructure Engineer for 3 years.
I became a developer because I am interested in seeking ways to automate repetitive tasks and improve inefficient processes.
I worked as a Frontend Developer at AllofThem in Japan, and also handled Backend development when necessary.
Currently, I have been working as a Frontend Developer at CodeCrayon for 2 years, focusing on webviews for e-commerce and video platforms.
I enjoy building services together and contemplate ways to contribute to the team beyond just development skills.
I like finding realistic and effective solutions when facing new problems.

descriptions.subtitle: Added subtitle translation system for Shortime admin page

descriptions.subtitle: AI-based subtitle translation automation tool
descriptions.skills: Node.js, TypeScript, AWS Bedrock, OpenAI, Express
tasks: One-click translation: Automatically translate subtitle files with a single command
Multiple AI engines: Support and easy switching between multiple AI translation engines
Translation quality verification: Guaranteed quality with an automated verification system
Large volume processing: Support for large subtitles with chunking and parallel processing
Web-based tool: Improved usability with Web UI
descriptions.achievement: Developed an AI subtitle translation system, enabling 1 person to process 6-8 works per day, which previously required 2-3 people per work (600% productivity improvement, based on workload per person)

descriptions.achievement: Achieved significant increase in platform WAU (Weekly Active Users) through game content planning and development. Contributed to improved user engagement and retention.
